Translations.Text: vela tenfe`u-ssefa`atu `indehu illa limen ezine leh. hatta iza fuzzi`a `an kulubihim kalu maza kale rabbukum. kalu-lhakk. vehuve-l`aliyyu-lkebir
kul mey yerzukukum mine-ssemavati vel'ard. kuli-llahu veinna ev iyyakum le`ala huden ev fi dalalim mubin
kul la tus'elune `amma ecramna vela nus'elu `amma ta`melun
kul yecme`u beynena rabbuna summe yeftehu beynena bilhakk. vehuve-lfettahu-l`alim
kul eruniye-llezine elhaktum bihi surakae kella. bel huve-llahu-l`azizu-lhakim
vema erselnake illa kaffetel linnasi besirav venezirav velakinne eksera-nnasi la ya`lemun
veyekulune meta haze-lva`du in kuntum sadikin
kul lekum mi`adu yevmil la teste'hirune `anhu sa`atev vela testakdimun

vekale-llezine keferu len nu'mine bihaze-lkur'ani vela billezi beyne yedeyh. velev tera izi-zzalimune mevkufune `inde rabbihim. yerci`u ba`duhum ila ba`din-lkavle. yekulu-llezine-stud`ifu lillezine-stekberu levla entum lekunna mu'minin
